Sentencas: The Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia Zr1-x-yNdxGdyO2-delta (x, y = 0.025, 0.05, 0.075, and 0.10) system of materials were prepared through a modified sol-gel route.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Sintering of the samples was conducted using conventional sintering at 1300 degrees C for 6 h. The prepared materials are characterized by powder X-ray diffraction (P-XRD), scanning electron microscopy with energy dispersive spectroscope (SEM with EDS), Fourier transform infrared (FTIR), Raman, and impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The dense electrolyte pellets are produced with co-doping in zirconia.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: P-XRD confirmed the formation of samples with single phases with stabilized cubic structure even after the sintering of co-doped zirconia samples.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: SEM and EDS revealed good density in surface microstructure and elemental confirmation in all the compositions.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: XRD and SEM studies also revealed the highest relative density and small grain size of Zr0.85Nd0.075Gd0.075O2-delta.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: FTIR disclosed the absorption bands corresponding to the chemical bonds of oxides in the compositions, and the findings are consistent with the P-XRD data.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Raman spectroscopy analysis revealed the further phase confirmation of cubic structure.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy unveiled the enhanced electrical properties, i.e., enhanced ionic conductivity and small activation energy of NGZ7.5.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The enhanced ionic conductivity, i.e., 0.47 x 10-2 S/cm at 550 degrees C with the stabilized cubic structure of Zr0.85Nd0.075Gd0.075O2-delta sample makes it suitable for solid electrolytes towards intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Structural and electrical studies of Nd and Gd co-doped zirconia electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications
